QuestData.Title: Evacuate the Premises
QuestData.Description: The people of Anglepoint need me to stand tall, to not panic in the face of the unknown.$b$bI will admit to not being the best at this.$b$bEven now, the fishpackers are handling the tainted product and preparing it for shipment. They are in great danger, and we cannot allow them to stay in harm's way.$b$bWe must get them to safety!
QuestData.CompletionText: We've already witnessed one innocent death today. We cannot allow any more!
QuestData.RewardText: If there is even a chance of harm to innocents, we must protect them at all cost.
